rstansensitivity 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

CheckModelEquivalence()

Check whether two stan models objects agree on draws in sampling_result.

EvaluateModelAtDraws()

Evaluate a model (represented as a stanfit object) at MCMC draws, possibly from a different model.

GenerateSensitivityFromModel()

Generate stan models for sensitivity calculations from a model with a hyperparameters block.

GetHyperparameterDataFrame()

Get a dataframe with the hyperparameter values contained in a stan data list.

GetImportanceSamplingFromModelFit()

Use importance sampling to approximate means at different hyperparameter values. Experimental use only.

GetMCMCDataFrame()

Convert a Stan sampling result to a form that can be joined with tidy sensitivity results.

GetSamplingModelFilename()

Get the filename of the stan model to be used for sampling.

GetSensitivityStandardErrors()

Estimate Monte Carlo standard errors for the sensitivity matrices using a normal approximation and the delta method. These standard errors are based on what may be unrealistic assumptions, and should be interpreted with caution.

GetStanSensitivityFromModelFit()

Process the results of Stan samples and GetStanSensitivityModel into a sensitivity matrix. Note that currently, only the first chain is supported.

GetStanSensitivityModel()

Compile the sensitivity model and get a stanfit object and related information.

GetTidyResult()

Process the results of GetStanSensitivityFromModelFit into a tidy dataframe with standard errors.

PlotSensitivities()

Make a barchart from the output of GetTidyResult.

PredictSensitivityFromStanData()

Use the linear approximation to predict the sensitivity to a new stan data list.

SetSensitivityParameterList()

Get a legal version of the sensitivity parameters in a list that can be passed to a sensitivity model fit object.

SummarizeSensitivityMatrices()

Make a tidy dataframe out of a sensitivity matrix and its standard errors.

TransformSensitivityResult()

Make a tidy dataframe out of a sensitivity matrix and its standard errors.

Contents

  • All functions
